title: Big Data Engineer (Remote work)
description:
About the job
Serit is looking for a Big Data Engineer with: + 5 years in Big Data development, expertise in Hadoop, Spark, Hive and proficiency in Java, Python, or Scala and experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)

Role Responsibilities:
üîπ Design and optimize large-scale data pipelines for financial data processing
üîπ Build ETL workflows and implement Big Data solutions (Hadoop, Spark, Hive)
üîπ Develop scalable code in Java, Python, or Scala
üîπ Collaborate with data scientists to drive insights
üîπ Ensure data quality, security, and performance
üîπ Mentor and lead a team of data professionals

100% remote work (only from Spain)
High level of English (mandatory)
